full_summary:
### Title 
- **English Title**: **Continuous Improvement and Modernization - Business Analysis Services**
- **French Title**: **Amélioration et Modernisation Continue - Services d'Analyse en Opération**

### Tender Information
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01013370
- **Solicitation Number**: NS23-19730
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 25, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

### Background
The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) is seeking a contractor to provide business analysis services to support its continuous improvement and modernization efforts. This engagement aims to leverage expertise in business analysis, change management, and innovation to optimize internal and external stakeholder applications and services.

### Objectives
- Conduct analysis and renewal of the NSERC's case management system
- Renew the workplace and accompanying technology devices
- Implement a new Information Management Strategy

### Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada
- **Contact Person**: Justine Arsenault
- **Email**: tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca
- **Address**: 125 Zaida Eddy Private, 2nd floor, Ottawa, ON K1R 0E3

### Tender Documentation
- The solicitation document is available for download from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/f64b4333feebaf8111af2384fbee82ec/n23-19730_-_npp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/f64b4333feebaf8111af2384fbee82ec/n23-19730_-_npp_eng.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/e7e81cedfdbb0651646c441061ba3509/n23-19730_-_npp_fre.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/e7e81cedfdbb0651646c441061ba3509/n23-19730_-_npp_fre.pdf)
